2025-07-08.content: Cloud Armor [preconfigured WAF rules](https://cloud.google.com/armor/docs/waf-rules) can now inspect up to the first 64kB (either 8kB, 16kB, 32kB, 48kB, or 64kB) of the POST or PATCH [request body content](https://cloud.google.com/armor/docs/security-policy-overview#post-body) in Preview.

summary.title: Cloud Armor WAF Rules Now Inspect Larger Request Bodies
summary.summary: Cloud Armor preconfigured WAF rules now support inspecting up to 64kB of POST/PATCH request body content in Preview. This enhancement allows for more comprehensive security analysis of incoming data.

2025-06-27.content: Cloud Armor's [Hierarchical security policies](https://cloud.google.com/armor/docs/hierarchical-policies-overview) facilitate centralized control, enhanced consistency, operational efficiency, and effective delegation of security policy management in Preview.

summary.title: Hierarchical Security Policies Now in Preview
summary.summary: This feature allows for centralized control, consistent security policies, and efficient management, with support for policy delegation.

2025-06-24.content: Cloud Armor supports [organization-scoped address groups](https://cloud.google.com/armor/docs/address-groups-overview#organization-scoped-address-group) for security policies in Preview.

summary.title: Cloud Armor supports organization-scoped address groups
summary.summary: Cloud Armor now supports organization-scoped address groups in preview, allowing for more centralized management of security policies across your organization.

2025-06-18.content: Cloud Armor supports Network Threat Intelligence (NTI) in [globally scoped edge security policies](https://cloud.google.com/armor/docs/security-policy-overview#expandable-1) for Media CDN edge cache services in Preview.

summary.title: Cloud Armor NTI Support for Media CDN
summary.summary: Cloud Armor now supports Network Threat Intelligence for Media CDN edge cache services, enhancing security for globally scoped edge security policies.

2025-06-09.content: Cloud Armor support for JA4 rate limiting key is Generally Available. For more information, see [Configure rate limiting](https://cloud.google.com/armor/docs/configure-rate-limiting).

summary.title: Cloud Armor JA4 Rate Limiting Now Available
summary.summary: JA4 rate limiting key is now available in Cloud Armor. Learn more about configuring rate limiting.
